title: Dead Rising 3
notes: Game launches fine, no graphical glitches and performance is acceptable, but there is no sound and on my short test I experienced terrible stuttering and issues with mouse input

title: Dead Rising 3
notes: The Performance is awful, really slow, and it does Crash when in areas with tons of stuff going on (like Zombies). It also has the same problem as DR2 with the Camera/Mouse controls. They're stiff, like I'm using a mouse as a D-Pad, can barely turn the camera.
Started once and immediatly crashed in the menu forcing me to log out, tried again and now it won't launch. Also there was no sound.
title: Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition
